title: What’s Today’s Lucky Item?
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>Phew.... That was also a good article.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s amazing that it features school idols from all over Japan, right!? I can read it forever~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, may I look at the fortune page?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Sure, do you believe in them, Shioriko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Hmm.... I try to only believe in the good fortunes. How about you, Hanayo-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I’m probably the same. It’s always great to hear you’ll have the best fortune on morning TV!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu, you’re right. Let’s see... You’re a capricorn, right, Hanayo-san? ....Ah, you have the best luck this month! Your lucky item is.... flowers. It seems that you should wear a lot of flower accessories.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Flowers, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Umm, if you’d like, why don’t you come to my flower arrangement class? You can try it with me, and we can make a beautiful flower basket.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Waaah, may I really!? I want to go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
